Pre-Game Insights: A win for Pakistan keeps them in contention for a semi-final, victory for South Africa ensures their final-four spot
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's captain refuses to blame slippery conditions for their fielding errors
Miscellaneous Highlights: Fakhar Zaman out of T20 World Cup with knee injury
Others: The attack-first mindset that drove Pakistan's recovery from 43 for 4 was thrilling to witness, but it left the feeling of what could have been
